content.rendered:
Ships within 24 hours!

US Shipping: $8.00 Flat Rate Standard Shipping for Orders Under $75.00. FREE Standard Shipping for Orders Over $75.00

excerpt.rendered:
Custom printed label rolls of various sizes for your barcode needs.  Comes currently in 5 different sizes. Need blank label rolls? Click here. Need a size not listed? Contact us.

Please select your preferred label size, and customize the text you want on the label. Each order contains 1,000 labels of the desired size. If you have multiple UPCs you want barcodes for, add to cart and push back to customize and add another to cart, or contact us with a spreadsheet of your codes/text/size preference and we will invoice you.

fields.label: UPC/EAN Number
fields.description: Enter your UPC/EAN Number.  Don't have one? Order one at UPCs.com first.
